notes: Function calls (math and time) in streaming mode - this tests the challenging scenario of tool calls with streaming
requestBody: {"model":"gpt-5-nano","max_output_tokens":200,"stream":true,"input":[{"content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"You are a helpful assistant with math and time capabilities."}],"role":"system"},{"content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Calculate the square root of 144, then tell me the current time in Tokyo timezone."}],"role":"user"}],"tools":[{"description":"Perform mathematical calculations","type":"function","parameters":{"required":["expression"],"type":"object","properties":{"expression":{"description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate","type":"string"}}},"name":"calculate_math"},{"description":"Get the current time in a specific timezone","type":"function","parameters":{"properties":{"timezone":{"type":"string","description":"Timezone identifier (e.g., 'America\/New_York')"}},"type":"object","required":["timezone"]},"name":"get_current_time"}]}
